<title>Info</title>

<h3>The "Info" Command</h3>

The info sub-methods are used for accessing various interal attributes and information about Jsi.

    <nowiki><pre class=verbatim>
Info.vars('*');
Info.funcs('*');
</pre></nowiki>

The documentation in [./reference.wiki|Reference] is generated entirely using <b>Info</b>

For more details see [./reference.wiki#Info|Reference].
